Articles.Content: I am currently designing a Kopernicus mod that will give Moho, the Mun, Minmus, Ike, Dres, Vall, Tylo, and Eeloo all thin atmospheres, to both enhance realism, and because why not. However, I can't find any tutorials on giving airless bodies atmospheres. If anyone knows how, please post it below.
I don't think it's possible to give atmospheres to atmosphereless stock bodies.
if you could not spawn the stock system in Kopernicus on load you could replace them with an alternate system
